main event: A large silver object with fire coming out of its base was reported hovering about 50 feet off the ground in Hopkinsville, Kentucky.
interesting points: The object was observed by the Chief of Police, Sheriff of Caldwell County, and Princeton Police Department., The sighting occurred on 21 Aug 66, but reported to Air Force on 7 Sep 66., The object was described as large and silver with flames emanating from the base., The observation time was around 2030 hours., The report was part of the Project Blue Book investigation.
sighted object: large silver object with fire coming out of the base
witness description: Chief of Police, Sheriff of Caldwell County, and Princeton Police Department officers
